result.name: 1027. D++ Again
result.group: Timus Online Judge - Ural State University Internal Contest October'2000 Junior Session

tests.input:
Hello, here is a sample D++ program. It contains some arithmetical expressions like
(2+2=4), (2+-/*) and ((3+3)*3=20(*this is not true, but you donâ€™t have to verify it :-) *)+8)

does not belong to any arithmetical expression*)
